personal_brand.hero_statement: I build AI-powered systems that streamline service businesses. This site updates itself with AI.
personal_brand.about_me: I architect practical AI systems for service businesses that value operational excellence.
personal_brand.work_philosophy: Sophisticated systems should remove friction, clarify decisions, and create reliable outcomes without unnecessary complexity.

services.description: Designs reliable automations across lead capture, delivery operations, and reporting.
services.client_value_add: Reduces manual overhead while improving consistency and visibility.

portfolio_demos.problem_solved: Manual lead follow-up and post-inspection communication caused inconsistent client response times.
Scheduling and estimate workflows lacked transparency, creating delivery delays and status confusion.
Content and campaign operations were fragmented, limiting repeatable growth execution.

google_reviews.quote: Brian G owner of Pure Home Inspections says Andrew's system made our follow-ups automatic and fast. We no longer miss any leads and our clients get quick replies every time.
D.J. C owner of NextGen Wallcovering shares that the new workflow brought clear steps and updates for everyone. Our team and customers now know exactly where each job stands.
Prof Keith W. staff sponsor for AInspire says Andrew helped us bring all our content and campaigns into one smooth process. It made running projects easier and more consistent.
